long_description: The Keen Rose sandals are water-adventure ready, but offer a fun, feminine design. Polyester webbing uppers perform well in wet conditions; rip-and-stick closures make them easy and quick to strap on. Hydrophobic mesh linings are soft against bare feet. EVA footbeds are shaped to provide ample cushioning and arch support. EVA midsoles offer rich shock absorption and padding for all-day wear. Patented rubber Toe Guards protect feet from scuffs, bumps and uneven terrain. The Keen Rose sandals feature nonmarking carbon rubber outsoles for durability and superb traction.
short_description: The Keen Rose sandals are water-adventure ready, but offer a fun, feminine design.
